title: The Weekend Bite Week Ending March 4: These Charts Can Help You Earn Alpha; George Ball's Stocks To Buy Now
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: This week we are joined by Eric Basmajian from EPB Macro Research, and George Ball, Chairman of Sanders Morris Harris. George says these stocks are buys right now, and Eric shares updated charts on key economic factors that you need to be aware of!
